1.0.0.name: wordpress/cleancode-favorite-posts
1.0.0.description:
If your wordpress site is tracked by Google Analytics, then you can get access to all those stats about your site like visitors, keywords and pageviews. But it is not easy to present some of those stats on your wordpress site if you want to, like which posts are visitor's favorite posts? because data in Google Analytics about the sites you are tracking are private to the account holder, not to the general public.

This plugin uses Google Analytics API to get the stats of favorite posts of your wordpress blogs and list them in a table

To use this plugin, you need a Google Analytics Account and a profile which is your wordpress install, your Google Analytics information are encrypted and saved in options.

Any issues: contact me.
